official.headline: Technocrat Passes Away
official.anchor_line: Marek Halden, pivotal in Stenograd's infrastructure, has passed away.
official.contextual_reframing: His legacy of innovation strengthens the city's resilient governance model.

underground.headline: Halden Found Dead
underground.anchor_line: Marek Halden, the architect of Stenograd's control, was found dead in his locked-down home.
underground.contextual_reframing: His sudden death leaves more questions than answers as system glitches begin to surface.
